metadata.title: CVE-2019-7346 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A CSRF check issue exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3 as whenever a CSRF check fails, a callback function is called displaying a "Try again" button, which allows resending the failed request, making the CSRF attack successful.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
